lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doc! I'm back from the future with crazy news!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've done this before, Marty, how bad could it be?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't get it, Doc, I went to the year 2020, and it was heavy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Heavy? What, did Biff stir up more trouble with his Sports Almanac? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, yeah, sports isn't really a thing any more in 2020.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, is it your kids, Marty? Are they in trouble?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's kind of a global thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa, Doc, are you checking a photo to see if I'm disappearing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: His face, it's so elastic; I love it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Listen, Doc, about 2020, it gets pretty rough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No matter what happens, I'm sure you solved it with some hilarious antics, like riding a hoverboard or wearing a Darth Vader mask to fool your dad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I did wear a mask.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And did you punch Biff in the face?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I didn't get within six feet of Biff, or really anyone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Great Scott! Marty, was there anything good about 2020?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's up to you to restore the temporal order.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, great Scott, that sounds more like it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter) The game includes four miniature-- Is this close to the voice? It's not, is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold on, let me just get this tribble off my head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It sounds like Rick and Morty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you ever seen Back to the Future?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My apologies to our friends Rahv-ensburger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ravens-burger, and they can take that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They can take that and put it in in post, right, Marisha? Is that how that works?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've been playing so many of them over the lockdown period, oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, Sam, could you please give us an example of your Doc Brown, if you don't mind?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (clears throat) We've done this before, Marty, how bad could it be? Heavy? Did Biff stir up more trouble with his Sports Almanac?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And thank you to our second sponsor who's been with us since the beginning of Campaign 2, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have a few more announcements to get through, beginning with Marisha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can join us on Tuesday, July 28th at 7:00pm on Twitch for our next episode of All Work No Play: Unplugged featuring Laura Bailey! (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We had such a great time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See how surprised even she looks?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was like, a Laura Bailey.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of course, if you miss the stream, the VOD will be available on our Twitch channel immediately and on YouTube the following Thursday, like 36 hours, something like that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the best episode we've done of the show.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And speaking of Laura Bailey, a Laura Bailey, you have some things to talk about, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Our very first button down, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could you wear that to work?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I'm biased, but I think it's pretty cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, there's a little red there on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A little button at the bottom.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will be wearing it under a suit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's the little doodles by Wendy, @WendyDoodles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So yeah, all of the purchases will benefit our friends at Red Nose Day, and they are providing vital aid to children who are below the poverty line and have been impacted negatively by COVID-19, and that's not how you wear it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You could wear one on up and then one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And a little metal in it so you can squish your nose.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have to protect your blowhole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So yeah, you get two in each packet, and then we also have kids' sizes available.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And our masks are available right now in the U.S. and the UK shops, and will be in our Australian store very soon as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is the last of our announcements.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (random cast noises) (water bubbling) (thunder rumbling) (explosion) ♪ Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Mighty Nein ♪ ♪ Mighty Nein ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ The adventure begins ♪ ♪ They were always beside you ♪ ♪ Your nerdy best friends ♪ ♪ And the DM to guide you ♪ ♪ And they rise from the flames ♪ ♪ For the battles ahead ♪ ♪ Villains beware ♪ ♪ 'Cause you're 'bout to be dead ♪ ♪ They got magic and flare ♪ ♪ They got falchions and cunning ♪ ♪ They don't see over there ♪ ♪ There's a monster incoming ♪ ♪ Inspiration is waiting ♪ ♪ Rise up, don't think twice ♪ ♪ Put your fate in your hands ♪ ♪ Take a chance, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ Can you answer the call ♪ ♪ Diggin' deep in your soul ♪ ♪ As the legend unfolds ♪ ♪ Now it's your turn ♪ ♪ Your turn, your turn ♪ ♪ To roll ♪ (flames whooshing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's twice in two weeks that we're both super late.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long have you been here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Going on probably "two and a half decades, longer."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And how did you find yourself stranded here in the first place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was unconscious for the better part of a week "and when I came to, the people of Vo had found me "by the base of the mountain on the eastern side."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whatever magic takes this island, "whatever this Vokodo is capable "of enshrouding upon this island works quickly."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that mean we're at risk right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Those who've traveled here since, "within but a matter of days "began to forget quite a bit of who they once were."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you think this magic extends from Vokodo, not from the island itself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But it all seems to be serving Vokodo directly."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And forgive us, but how has this community grown in these two decades, did you say, here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "...less than legal sailors of the seas of the Lucidian, "and whatever wealth they had brought "in hopes of keeping them here "eventually found its way to Vokodo as well."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Were there fewer when you arrived?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So all these people are, in a sense, being kept here against their will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Some have been there their whole life, I believe."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And what do you think now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know I've probably been robbed of mine."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you have a family back there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that mean you're not from this plane?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm from here, "but outside of Exandria there are-- "how versed are you in the overall "planar structure of the world and beyond?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we know all about-- There's a Feywild.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you were on a different plane, and then you got (whooshes) sent here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He exhibits whatever power this is over the island, "whether it's himself or he uses it to its will, "but as individuals forget themselves, "so comes the loyalty to Vokodo, "so it would not be a stretch of logic "to think that they two are related."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The last two and a half decades-- you seem to have a clear recollection of your time before here. Do you remember the last two and a half decades in a different light?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you know what this creature could be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've studied quite a bit about the magics of nature, "and a number of the strange "elements of the world around us, "but as one who has been to Pyrah "and has seen the Fire Plane, "has immersed myself in the very nature of the flame, "I have no idea what this Vokodo is."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you know he's not a god?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there someone on the island who would know, if we cleared their mind, too?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your mind could be turned again within days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We all have "to get off this island."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter) Sorry, the Vo community is extremely important.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No one has challenged this creature?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "By the time they've come to him "most of any reason they would've had "to challenge him had faded."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So you wouldn't know of any weaknesses that he might have, things that they recoil from, or are sensitive to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, have you ever witnessed him go, "Eugh," about anything, or noticed that he has a butthole or anything on the underside?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you attack somebody in the butthole, it's instant. They have a reaction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I wouldn't say it's instant death, but it weakens them pretty hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "-- I cannot say that I've "noticed such a--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How does he go to the bathroom, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And even since I've been here, "the island has been slowly changing."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I've spoken with those "who've been here long before me, "but there are shards of other places embedded here, "like where re walked through, where I took you, "that darkened area, that swamp-like space "was not like that once, "and from my knowledge, it's almost like an element "of the Shadowfell has bled through in just that space."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I heard The Traveler talk about that one time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that? Is that a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's scary or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would know what the Shadowfell is, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's something about the presence of Vokodo, "whether it's Vokodo's arrival "or just living in this space that is slowly--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Breaking down the barriers between planes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Ruins, these spots have always been here, "they've just been slowly expanding."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Ruin was once just a singular section "with a few buildings that were left in rubble "and one spire-like construct, "and since then the trees around it "have slowly died and withered, "and that land is expanding."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Heaven's Fall, have you been back since you--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's forbidden by Vokodo to traverse them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's his weak spot. It's his weak spot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sounds like maybe that's how you got here, maybe--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't look at the man behind the curtain.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that a water, Water World?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That actually could be the butthole.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so hang on then, because there's also--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's where there's mines and gems.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They get all the jewels out, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We, ourselves, only find safety "in mining the southeast portion of it "that's not terribly far from our village."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we have to free everyone else?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we have to try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should get as many as we can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's really hard to get into.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have somewhere in the neighborhood--" (laughter) "Close to 120 villages of Vo total."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, we could potentially have more people coming for Traveler Con than already are--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a bit of a pickle for what you have in mind, Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And what is to happen "to them if they stay for a day, two days?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I don't know! I didn't know that this could happen until just now!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if, oh, oh, I have an idea! What if we free as many people as we can in the next couple days, we keep doing Greater Restorations, right, on everybody, and then when everybody comes for Traveler Con, we use all the people from the village that are free as well as all of the new people coming for Traveler Con, and we just attack Guacamole.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What happens in two days when I forget who I am?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, how on earth would you-- would we convince the 200 Traveler fans--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, and so they're going to arrive here for Traveler Con and Traveler's going to be like, "Welcome, first things first, "let's go attack a lava god."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Has a nice ring to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could also potentially magic away all the people here in Vo, but it is a trap for your friends who are coming.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It seems like the numbers are against us, so we either clear the island, fix the island, fix Vokodo, or your 200 or 300, however many it is, risk not following The Traveler, but Vokodo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's a reason only I have been the one interfacing "to make the various offerings, "because as you've seen, the journey to get there "is fraught with much peril, "and very few have the constitution and capability "of surviving that journey."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The other of your triumvirate, Terra, the hunting leader, a fearsome warrior I would imagine, yes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So if we were to be picky with our restorations, perhaps they might be who we go after next?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think Terra would be quite the asset "if this is something you wish to pursue."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are quite powerful yourself, yes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, are you going to make a collect call?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before you talk to The Traveler, could we talk to you? You, Jester. Yeah, you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How did you get the vision for a volcano island? How did you find out about Rumblecusp?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Traveler pointed you in this direction, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you pitch the idea of a volcano?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs nervously) I was thinking that volcano that we were at with your family--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- and then it was like, well, maybe instead we should do something tropical because that would be a nice vacay, and then there was a tropical volcano.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I regret not putting up more of a fight about that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- pushed us here, perhaps he knows--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Didn't you say he wanted to be less busy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He has to know something weird is going on in this place, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was like, "Oh, seems weird." I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you think there's any chance that he would, I don't know, materialize again and help us in a (clicks) assault against--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- could ask him to do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've been here one night already, correct?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is day two, and now it's turning into evening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Vilya at this point pipes up and goes, "From the experiences I've had, "usually the first night is not terribly eventful, "but it begins to quickly take hold after that."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you two Caduceus and Jester, you both have the ability to undo this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I will have the ability tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I just have to, you know, talk to The Traveler and pick what I want to do for the day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many total, between you two? Three or two?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have this magical ability that they used?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I believe I do have access to it, yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, okay, so if we wake up tomorrow and one of us is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if it's all of us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if it's the two of us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you know, Vilya, we've been doing this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you prefer we kill you and leave you here, or just leave you alive?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, we could sleep in shifts, maybe, and each of you could take a shift--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, for the record, if we want to leave tomorrow we can leave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have come here for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, The Traveler's depending on me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you think there is any validity to Beauregard's theory?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What happens if we sleep on the ship?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if he knew.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you want? You've always said you want The Traveler to be a god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, not if he doesn't want that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we all still name our parents and where we came from?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we'd know if we did that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We did it earlier, but can we do it now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb, how long did it take us to get here from the village?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me look at my paper again, it was roughly six to eight hours to get from Vo to where you are here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The problem is, the idea of going back and getting reinforcements, whether it's Terra, Lukash, or the were-bear people, it's going to take time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going to take a day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anybody have any means of traversing over? "I've seen some of you--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If we can bypass having to go through the jungle, "that will significantly decrease "the time we require to get there."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we would be going there to get an ally or two to do what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To come help us fight this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just going to go in there and like, (punches) fight? Or should we go to this Falls first?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree with Veth. I think we need more information on what's going on here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we want to go where Vokodo wants us not to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If someone says "Don't go to the butthole," that's the first place to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should respect it if they don't want to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we still talking about the same thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think those are the only primary places "that are considered limited."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's where we have to go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which of those two has decent beach access? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, so we can sleep on the ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We go, we investigate, we finish our investigation, we have Orly pick us up on the beach, we sail out by a few hundred meters, and we sleep on the ship tonight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or we sleep on the ship tonight and then sail it over there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or, we cast Breathe Underwater on all of us and then we go sleep in the water, and we don't need a ship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unless we get attacked by a giant--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also, the Heaven's stair, yeah, Heaven's Falls, isn't it quite a journey?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From here, "if by wing, not quite as far, "but on foot from where we stand now, "if we go along the mountain "we could probably get there in about six hours, "but it's a perilous journey to hike along the--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If we're going through the jungle "we're looking at the better part of a day, 10 to 12."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Clock is ticking on the thing that--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: -- our memory not being affected, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can we-- How are we feeling? Are we feeling?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Little unsettled, a little poopy happening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Marisha's asking the DM how are we feeling? Are we starting to feel foggy on things, are we like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How are the colors right now? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you there, DM? It's me, Marisha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This might help you actually get a little bit of a visual.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like the idea of going as far away from this place as possible tonight, sleeping and then coming back in the morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take a picture of it and text it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think we can fight this thing yet until we have more information on what it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I could put it right over here, in front of the table, if you want to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to hand me that, I can-- throw it back, I can put it right in the middle of the table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll see it on these little--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The village of Vo is about here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Depends on what you guys have at your disposal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or we can fly to the ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A few of us can fly, and you can, too. Right, Vilya?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We could probably carry more than one, "but that's going to be challenging, "and failure there could have some grave consequences."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe two plus, like Veth, you could be on my back, maybe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are we saying the butthole is? In the shadow of those two rocky crags on that side?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's in that dark place there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Ruins are up in the center of this open space here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to see the Ruins too, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to see the Ruins.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's that seemingly separated island off the corner?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And DM, Liam asking, Vilya said that Vokodo doesn't like people visiting the Ruins, or--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And where was the Ruins again? Not in the shadow. There.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She was found near there, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we need to message Orly to get the ship around to the other side, we need to sleep with some sort of plan in case all of us are mind melted overnight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why can't we Breathe Underwater, swim to the bottom, you use your thingy so nothing can get in, and then we sleep underwater beneath the ship?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, at this point in time it's pushing close to like, nine, 10 o'clock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We would have to hike or fly for hours in the dark to get to water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or maybe it's safer on that other island, I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if I trust another uncharted island right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My vote's for back on the boat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've got a perfectly comfortable boat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can't teleport us today, can you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could teleport us to a city we know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we could fly to the boat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then we can sail around to Heaven's Falls and check it out in the morning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would take hours and hours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you have the capability "of carrying the entirety of your party through flight?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can fly right now? I thought you couldn't fly earlier, Caleb?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But that's why we didn't fly earlier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was an owl earlier, wasn't I?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't have the Fly spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah, then we should be able to do it, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would've been helpful before we made the trek."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't want to sleep here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we can collect the crew they can sail their way to the other side maybe while we sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, yeah, the crew.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I chose Keen Mind and Identify so we'd always know what's up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going back to the boat?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long would it take-- Captain?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long, in your esteemed nautical mind, would it take us to sail 'round the island.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have no clue, no idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two hours? Three? Five? A day?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I mean, if I had to guess it based off of the other big ole map--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To go around the island at 35 miles per hour.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 35? That's how fast we can go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, on the ship you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're looking at, pace would be about three-- Sailing ship should be about two to three miles an hour.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it's probably three to five miles an hour, maybe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And how big is the, I'm not--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How big is the island across? How many miles across is it approximately?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if there was another boat going in the opposite direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we're going to fly at night to the boat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And let the crew know to get ready.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, this would be a commercial break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Myself and the crew "are in the village."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ask him what the fuck happened.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you got one more in you, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck happened?! Was it the dragon turtle? Was it Vo...kodo?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he remember where he parked it? Maybe he just forgot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it sail away without you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) "Heard a terrifying crunch sound, "and watched her sink."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to kill him now because if we don't we're going to be stuck here forever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, they will. We can't get everybody out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We told them to stay, to get off of the boat and sleep on the beach.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think that's what this is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa, what? How does that even work? We'll float away, there's currents.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I think we need to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go to the dark place in between.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Both are good. Well, there is no boat, so your idea, it's a good one, we sleep underwater.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb agrees with me! Caleb agrees with me! He said I was smart!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How would that work? We have to tether ourselves together to an anchor, and how, I mean, what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, will we float to the top of the dome and just kind of like sleep in the dome?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The dome doesn't really keep you from leaving.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could just sleep in shifts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just thought of a-- What are we going to breathe in the dome?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, he was saying we cast Water Breathing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long does it last for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it keep concentration when you're sleeping? Yes, it does!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Underwater isn't going to stop us from the vibe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, then our only option is Caleb, you teleport us out and then tomorrow morning we teleport back in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Teleport us to Essek and he can teleport us back in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god, we're going to travel 5,000 miles just to sleep? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or we forget who we are and we stay here forever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we know how it works, or is it just--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there something that we can do to ensure that you'll be strong of will, constitution overnight?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you seen Caduceus' dexterity checks lately? He's going to forget who he is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to forget how to walk at the rate of this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know, does this phenomenon come with sleep specifically?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Were there signs that it was happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Commonly it would be upon waking "that memories would fade."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it would happen completely overnight, or it would be like, you'd wake up and be like, "Oh no, I'm starting to forget some stuff," and then the next day--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But large sections would leave with each morning "that one was not prepared."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you remember how to do things? Or do you just forget why you would do them? Do you feel like you lost--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I could still use my capabilities, "the skills, the things that were not inherent "to my personal experiences, to my relationships, "to my sense of identity, those stayed, "everything else just went away."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You do not lose your total sense of self.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's engineered to keep you from leaving."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So are we going to the Heaven's Falls, or are we going to get Terra first and then the Heaven's Falls?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's always a chance that if we try to get Terra the other villagers might not let them go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a chance that Terra won't want to go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm more of the inclination that we stick to ourselves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we want to try and investigate this other island that's fairly uncharted, or do we think that that's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But also, we know the places that we need to investigate: the Ruins, the Heaven Falls. We don't need to add a third place that's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If it's just far enough away from Vokodo--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe it's just too far so he doesn't bother mining it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, it's out of his radius, maybe it's far enough.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My ability to fly will only last an hour at a time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get to Heaven Falls and then go from there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe Caleb can send Frumpkin and scout out the other island.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If we're carrying as many figures "as we're discussing in these forms, "we're not going to be able to travel at full speed either, "so if you can only keep this for an hour, "be mindful of the time you have."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As soon as you start to land I will, too, okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll fly with you as well so we split up the healers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you just make that up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't take that much weight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who are we going? We're going with Caleb?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's leading? Who's in the--? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes a couple of steps, speeds up, and as she runs and looks like she's about to leap out of the hole, you watch, (whooshes) she transforms once again, wings extending out and loops out into the shadow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In a giant owl form, you see the familiar dark brown, textured, massive owl form now waiting at the exterior of the cavern.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I just offer an arm, or--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so she can grab you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you approach, the owl (whooshes) disappears into the shadow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whooshes) Suddenly from above these two large talons just grasp both sides of your arms and your feet are just kicking off into air.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got to talk about your nails.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I grab my two and follow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Same. Giant owl with navy, inky feathers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all are making your way around, and because of the weight--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and the speed you're traveling-- yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a bit of a challenge to maintain height, maintain the people you're carrying--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I do need Caleb and Jester and I'll have Vilya here to go ahead and just roll a standard strength check as the giant owl.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do the-- god, my god, my brain has made of Swiss cheese.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you know to Bless me, though?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to, yeah, I'm going to give you a Guidance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say Guidance does not apply to this because it's not a very short term--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, this is a prolonged exertion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You end up flying a little lower than you anticipated and coast right above where the trees and rocks on the outside of the mountain--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get in front of him and give him my tailwind so it's easier for him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that you find it a bit easier, but those of you who are dangling, yourself as well, Fjord, from beneath these birds, at times you are no more than four or five feet above the jagged pinnacle of a broken volcanic spire, or a broken tree trunk that is now jagging out in four or five different bladed tops as the moonlight just barely frames it to where you don't even notice it until it's right beneath you and you just barely miss it off the top.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this like a wing suit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of, that kind of a feel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I picture Beau doing a kickoff on one of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have not quite reached your destination yet when you are aware that the spell is about to fade.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five more minutes of this, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just follow his lead, if he starts to land, I go down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are on this slight outcropping on the mountain, safe, but in still near pitch darkness beyond what little bit of Catha moonlight is catching you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe try to stay a little bit higher next time, Caleb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why did you shapeshift into such a scrawny owl? You can like-- It doesn't have to be like you, right? When you shapeshift, you can beef 'em up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, well, I'm proud of my smarts, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, Vilya says, "Are you able to do that again?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then let's take the rest of the journey."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she turns right back into her giant owl form, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediately lifts off once more with Fjord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb changes and his whole head rotates 180 degrees around and looks at Veth, grabs her, grabs Caduceus. Hoo!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did one of you guys want to ride on my back, or are you good dangling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like both of you guys in those hanging rollercoasters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then as you pass over that edge it is a sheer drop, about 150 feet--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is quite a surreal sight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Breaks my brain a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it is maybe a five-foot patch of white beach sand before it turns into the rocky shore and the inlet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are no light sources here beyond the moonlight that you have.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll summon the sword and make it glow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys have that bit of a beacon of glowing light.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, did your sword show up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we see or hear anything around us? Noises, movement?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to do the same but as an owl, I have not changed out yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go off your example.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you're both going to check as well?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, at advantage as a giant owl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not have darkvision, so at disadvantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am going to do Eyes of the Grave, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And Detect Magic, just because why the fuck not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on Detect Magic again? Is it 60 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 feet? Neither one of those vision quests, localized vision quests seem to present you with anything unique or different from the nature that surrounds you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing out of the ordinary of what would be expected in the natural habitat that you stand at catches your attention.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do we feel like a-- Do we still feel like we're being watched, or does that feel a little heavier here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you'll forget about it at times, and you'll forget that it's there, and then the moment you're not in the middle of a conversation, not engaged in a challenge or a problem-solving thought, the minute you have a moment to pull out of the moment and think and breathe, you remember it's there, and it never left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do the head twist around to you and then (whooshes) back into myself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much longer do we have until the spell breaks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You probably have about 30 minutes or so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll go with you if you want to try and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (hooting) If you still wanted to go scout.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's saying she's sleepy is what she said.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, if you're tired, yeah, we could sleep, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just grab her and go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, where are you guys headed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to get 15 minutes out as far as I can go towards the island.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Towards the one to the northeast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then as far as we can go out, I want to see if that feeling ever subsides as we get more distant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It won't get you close to the island, you'll travel a little ways offshore, but since you're carrying somebody you can't move at the full speed, necessarily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check, both of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, don't fuck this up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The owl has advantage for perception, for hearing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is less about sight, this is more about just sensing something within yourself, so the owl sight would not--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it a thought or a hoot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But what you do notice with your perception as you're looking back over is the cap atop the volcano itself is glowing a little redder and the smoke is a little bit thicker than it was when you guys first traversed it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point you guys can feel a slight, like, (rumbling) just a brief burst of an angry rumble.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I should have left the sword.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a bunch of treasure up there and shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys head back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an intelligence check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You stop at what you think is about the 15 minute mark and start heading back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hard to count precise time when you're an owl.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, well I wouldn't really know, though, I guess, either.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys are just plummeting towards the ocean right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grab Beau and cast Dimension Door, 500 feet to the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to be an attempt for you guys to grab each other before you cast it because you are currently now falling with no anchoring on each other.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I really want this to fail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's just enough residual momentum to impact the sand, and all of you guys watch suddenly as they both vanish and then (whooshes) there is a splash of sand into all of your faces, gritting into your mouth and teeth for a second as both Beauregard and Jester sit there and stand up from the base of sand on the beach.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How cool did that look, everyone?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was it awesome? I've-- knocked the air out of me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you okay? I'm sorry. Are you okay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your teeth are so messed up right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are they--? No, is that true?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least you had the goggles on, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I can't see through them, there's a lot of bugs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The heavy gnat clouds that sit around the edge of the shoreline with all the dead crabs that are out there, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I can still feel the presence about 15 or so minutes off the shore, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bad news is the volcano looks maybe--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, like it's red and on the top, and it's smoky.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That just sounds like a volcano to me, no cause for concern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Has it ever been red and smoky before like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Generally only when something has angered Vokodo."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What would've made him angry, do you think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If a particular delivery of offerings "was not quite up to expected--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does he usually do if he gets super mad like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, it's generally an intimidation tactic."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, it's funny, Fjord, you just threw out your sword thing, but you also just gave that to him, so there could be some correlation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There-- there-- there might be, mm-hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You think he would notice that something like that went missing off his back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought he had an awful lot of treasure, that seems really--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I applaud it, that's a good move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "However," and Vilya looks back and you can see now at the top of the Rumblecusp volcano there is a definitive orange glow that is, in small ways, beginning to spider down the peak of the mountain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it look like it could reach here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't look like a major eruption, but there definitely is volcanic activity at the tip and some element of molten rock currently making its way from the peak.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is just Sauron going like--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, do we want to set up camp right here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I assume that you magic-y folks are nearing the end of your magics.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Got a little, but not a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That last flight wiped me out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there a place that looks safe? Could we walk a little bit to find something safe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if anything is safe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Has Vokodo ever left his lair?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've not seen him leave his lair, no."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there caves, recesses in the walls? Are there any--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should be fine with the dome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything to just help us camouflage if he does leave and looks while we sleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He sees us everywhere we go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we see any caves or any sort of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You imagine you could probably find an alcove or a cavern or a recess that could maybe fit all of you, but you'd have to climb alongside the cliff face to get to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, with all that ooze coming out of the tip maybe not the best idea to be alongside the mountain on second thought.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How 'bout right here on the beach?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still want to check this place out a bit, anyway, before I go to bed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, well I will go about creating the dome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You need any help or you good?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just make sure nobody punches me in the back of the head while I--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Yasha, will you stay here with me and we'll guard the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You going to check out the area?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, just want to-- Just going to-- Yeah, just figure out some shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who all's going to figure out some shit then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to sit down a little bit away from everyone and figure out some shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But with my sketchbook and I'm going to try to talk to the Traveler.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also going to have a moment with my shit while--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey dude, what was your favorite episode of Critical Role?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you're creating the dome, you're watching, Yasha you're watching as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Veth, are you doing anything in particular or are you just watching?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's going to look out at stuff? You two?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord is standing guard with Caleb and Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, Jester, what are you doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you sit with your sketchbook and you concentrate and focus, and how do you call the Traveler to you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a real-- He's a dick, man, like not in a good way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's a lot of them out there, you're not wrong."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are some places in the Fey "that are just mind-boggling."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "One of these days. You are welcome to."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you take everyone there? Can we sleep in the Feywild?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you know that could happen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, I understand if you want to get rid of some of your followers, we talked about it, it's okay, you know? A few of them could stay, but I don't want to stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If things went sideways when we arrived "I would've just plucked you and everyone else of import, and--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me tell you, trying to charter this many ships "from the middle of the Menagerie Coast--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But no, I wasn't going to abandon you and your friends."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to fight him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hedge my bets on those who fight for me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey man, maybe a dragon turtle will take out a couple of the boats on the way here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I don't want them dead necessarily."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The plan was if things went wrong "at the very least they'd be left here "to live a nice life in a village with some people, you know? "They weren't going to be hurt, "they just would've forgotten some things."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, they're living a nice life and nobody seems to hate it when their memory's gone, but I don't want to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you're right, I should've been a little more forthright "with some of the information."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sighs) I'm sorry, I don't mean to yell at you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's all right. I would've come back!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You want to see something very pretty?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you turn your head back and he's gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe didn't go as well as you were hoping?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't speak for him, but you do have us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So whatever you land on, Jester, we'll make it happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have to figure out what I want to land on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is the sticky wicket, isn't it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe we sleep on it, it'll make more sense in the morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with your eyes closed, you can feel just this warm formless embrace around you as the presence, the consciousness, the will of the Wild Mother you sense surround you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: this force that is eating our memories and will, does its influence extend to the island on the horizon?

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: We need you with legs, the rest I don't care about, but we need legs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then I finish out the whole thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One leg, 100 legs, just, you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like there are two smaller sandbank areas where some of the ships are pressed up upon, but most of this is just a deep subterranean lagoon where it's mostly open water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vokodo probably put all these ships here, which means he has access to this cavern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with your passive investigation being insane, and looking at the different types of ships here and glancing at some of them being in not as good care, or at least a little more rotted, similar to the wood you found before, you gather that these were probably ships of the different people that came to this island and never left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hiding the evidence so they can't remember, or leave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But that would mean someone would have to come out and get the ships, and if not him--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he comes out and gets them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe dinosaurs bring them in here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we should certainly search some of these.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, do they look like warships?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a couple of ships that are outfitted with cannonry and weapons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there is one very, very large, long ship that is, I'd say, roughly a third of the size larger than the Balleater was. That is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (like Lafayette in Hamilton) And so the balance shifts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But they're all just pressed in here and left.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do these ships look like they've been picked over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vilya currently emerges from the water beneath behind you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you ride the geyser out front, too?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, she came through when I was holding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you ever seen a squirrel hide nuts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm quite familiar with the behavior, yes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think these are just very big nuts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, that's a way of putting it."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you recognize any of these vessels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, some of these vessels "definitely I have seen bring "individuals to the island before."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any idea who, or what would move these back here besides Vokodo who never seems to leave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If I recall correctly, the individuals, "once they had no reason to leave "they were told to bring their ships back here."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is the entrance to the cave at water level? Could the ships be sailed into this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as much as you can imagine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should see how deep this goes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you say if any of them looked seaworthy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to get-- At first glance you're like, some of these would probably be seaworthy, but you'd have to give it a full once over, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The most expensive looking ship, the grandest, we can spot it, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anyone want to take a look inside? Or at least see how deep the cavern is before we just go fucking around?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should probably search that first, make sure that he's not going to pop out and surprise us, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's got to be another entrance into the mountain from here, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless this is just a garage of some sort.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why don't we just try to get the lay of the place first, and then if we feel like poking about that ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you can see the sandbanks and such that are on the side, they have a heavy drop off into the center of the water there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you're going around on the surface of the water, I'll go under just to make sure there's nothing underneath as we're fanning out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you, make a perception check for me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He had them bring them in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? Looking beneath the water, you see a faint orange glow on the opposite end of the deep, deep edge of the cavern on the furthest portion of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see just the faintest element of an orange glow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Something down there, in case anyone wants to come along.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll feel better once I'm standing on even--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are there any of the names visible on any of the ships?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to probably go around and check if you want to start picking them vessel by vessel.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, well, maybe we'll do that in a bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does there seem to be any other tunnels or entrances on this above water level?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, a lot of your vision is obfuscated by the vessels themselves, but from the areas that you're checking as you're swimming along and pushing between them, you don't make out any other tunnels that are visible above the water's surface or along the very edges where the sandbanks rise very temporarily above the surface of the water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And are there any, as we're walking along the walls, are there any tool marks? Does this cave look like he just found it and got lucky, or is this carved out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can gather, make an investigation check as you go along and swim to the edge of one of the walls on the side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appears natural porous volcanic rock, best to your ability, but the cavern is very large and you're uncertain as to what process naturally would create such a large space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there a certain time of day you usually visit with Guacamole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just about once every week or two "we'll bring what we've gathered or made "and I'll make a delivery."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Any time of day? Any time of day?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, I generally keep it about early afternoon "to give me time to get back to the village "before it gets too dark."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can fly quickly to and from when I'm by myself, "but even at night I wouldn't trust the airs "to just a solo creature like me."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, should we go further in to the orange glow and check it out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm afraid that's going to take us into his--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The water that was in the cave was freshwater.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll dive down and get closer to see what it is, if it's magma, doorway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The glow resembles the torch bloom, the faintly orange glowing plant-like seaweed flowers and such that currently, or last time you saw, guided you towards the lair of Vokodo.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb, where's Caleb? Do you have Frumpkin as a cat right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's a bird, and if you want him to be able to swim I'd need over an hour.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It seems to be, I'll say it's the same sort of growth that led toward his lair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we're going to go in and actually for real think about fighting today, yeah? Then--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think this is a path to him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And maybe this is spillage from the Fire Plane.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to head to about 30 feet away, 25 feet away from--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Detect Magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Swim up and rejoin his friends?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a wisdom saving throw for me, if you don't mind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is why we should've done the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sense this, and you look at the torch bloom, and this urge overtakes you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you swim towards it and you watch as the torch bloom opens up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where the fuck is he going? I go after him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as Caduceus just swims into a tunnel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can catch him, can't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also make a wisdom saving throw for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can probably catch up to him if you want to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you are faster with your armor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm calling out to him through the water, but yeah, I'll try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's a wisdom saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This'll be the first one I make, isn't it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, that's what I was just thinking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And so, you used your action to do so, so you can catch up to him, but Caduceus has listened to you and stops and looks back for a second towards you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got to go that way. It's very important.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Will someone come fucking help me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They can't hear you. You're far under water, and they're currently looking at the ships and inspecting the walls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you guys-- (laughter) I need you guys to make contested strength checks to see if you can grapple and keep him at bay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you have him-- (laughter) (groaning) You have him currently held, and thankfully the torch bloom is not close enough to the point-- like, the water is warm here, and right now you can sense something, while you're holding him, while you can breathe underwater, you can breathe the water, the water itself seems to shift from salty to fresh as you guys are struggling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it was going to lead him straight to the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to cast, fuck it, we've got to get the fuck out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know he means well, he means well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you're going to probably try and break free.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I remember this urge from before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, this is a rough one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: In the last tunnels, who was the one? Me and--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There were a bunch of different tunnels.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So this is one of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not going to hurt him or anything, but let's--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can do everything, I've got verbal, I've got everything I need, right? For casting a spell?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then try to break free.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the saving throw on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go make a constitution saving throw for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're wasting all of our spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Counterspell, does it have somatic components? Because you are currently holding Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you would not be able to Counterspell while you're grappling him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Means you need to be able to move your hands and fingers to cast a spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's all it is for a Counterspell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you let go and counter the spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the spell does nothing, but you are free of Fjord--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'm going to head my way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he's still trying to get away from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to catch his bitch-ass again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And none of us know of any of this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do we notice at some point that they're missing? Or we think--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But this is all happening very quickly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, Frumpkin, we are going to make you into an octopus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why are you doing this? This is ridiculous!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you pull him back? Can you just try to pull him back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think I'm just able to stop him, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you can use half your movement and drag him back, I'd say, which for you is a full movement because of the water, so--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far into this tunnel are we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're probably no more than 15 feet, maybe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah-- or you'd be about 30 feet at this point because you went in after him and you moved your double speed to get there, which would've been 15 and 15.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I had to use the action to cast the spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then you now take your turn to try and...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He just-- he doesn't understand, and this is very important.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, I'm trying not to hurt him, I'm trying to be nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you go blind, your eyes just go completely dark and you can see nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He took his action, which mean he hasn't broken from your grasp, and next turn he can try, and he'll put you at disadvantage to try and continue to hold him, grapple him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you going to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you Command him to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope, that's-- Fine, I rolled a-- finally rolled a 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have your movement and you can move him 15 feet in what you think is the backward direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 30 because it's half his movement, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, half his movement to do it, but he can move 30 feet in water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So for him it's half speed to pull you back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're gaining on him, unless he was able to break away from you, you gather you can probably drag him back, you just don't really know which direction's back and you're hoping.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I also don't want to touch those fire bloom shit, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You aren't certain where you are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as-- you don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to start Divine Smiting you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and break free, finally break free.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and go ahead and make contested--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One of them was a natural one, but the other one was 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure where he is, and you use the rest of your movement to go back into the entrance of the tunnel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can't see what's in front of me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm right near the entrance to the thing, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm just going to do three big reverse breast strokes and then just go straight up and start screaming.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I ever get a wisdom saving throw, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys, you hear the breaking of the water surface, and Fjord, what do you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caduceus is going forward! He's being pulled! Get in here!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I dive off whatever boat we're on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) So you guys, as you all begin to gather towards where Fjord is, you can see Fjord is treading water but is just--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Someone go get him. I'm useless.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I'm going to go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vilya's going to go ahead and use--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- a slot to cast Lesser Restoration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's good, because I don't have that one prepared.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I think that does it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'm pretty sure Lesser Restoration is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you have your vision back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you give me my spell slots back?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I dive in with the girls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all dive in beneath the surface.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to go for it, I guess.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're going to go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Head towards the orange glow where the torch bloom plants ring the interior of this tunnel sequence, where Caduceus is, from your current position, nowhere to be seen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you thrash your way, somehow knowing the path through these now continuously branching odd tunnels--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to go ahead and pick up next week.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not cool with this at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was like a nice happy, sleepy, content mid-point, and now just--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was seriously like, we should all sit down and have a Heroes' Feast before we do anything, and then we just got sucked in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord swims at full speed, and while you are behind, there is an opportunity to possibly catch up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But we'll see what that looks like next week because now it's a chase for your own party member who is being compelled, and to see if you can follow him through a network of tunnels that he knows the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And no prep time for possibly going to knock on Avocado's door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I wasn't expecting that to happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have a wonderful week, we'll see you soon, and is it Thursday yet? Good night.
